name: TOP WAR... But Real
description:
Top War... But Real Merge soldiers to get them better stats, and build your island empire by taking over the sea!

Welcome to my humble attempt at adapting a game that I saw advertised and was initially disappointed by. I was sad to see that the game didn't live up to my expectations, so I decided to try my hand at creating my own version.

While my coding skills  for these types of sandbox games are still in the early stages of development, I have done my best to incorporate the features I had hoped for and create a unique gaming experience. I recognize that there may be some limitations and imperfections, but I hope you will still find enjoyment in playing the game.

I am grateful for the opportunity to share my creation with you, and I would be honored if you could provide me with your feedback. Whether it be positive or constructive, I am eager to hear your thoughts and use them to improve my skills and make future iterations of the game even better.

Thank you for taking the time to play my game, and I hope you have a fun and enjoyable experience. Your support means the world to me.

Controls:

- CLICK AND DRAG TILE TO MOVE

- CLICK TWO SOLDIERS OF THE SAME LEVEL TO MERGE TO A HIGHER LEVEL
